item.title: Call for participation
item.description: Trust and Privacy in Networks (TRUSTNET DAY) Description of the event The objective of this thematic day (or workshop) is to allow members of the community to come together and discuss the themes of Trust, Security and Privacy in networks in general and the algorithmic tools and applications that go with it, in particular. This day includes presentations by researchers, including PhD students, and industrials. For its first edition, the organizers have chosen to make this event on one day.

item.title: Organizer(s)
item.description: Steering committee Cristina ONETE - University of Limoges, XLIM Abderrahim Benslimane - Avignon Université Melek Önen - EURECOM Valeria Loscri - INRIA Technical program committee

item.title: Venue
item.description: Location Faculté des Sciences et Techniques 123, Avenue Albert Thomas 87000 LIMOGES, FRANCE
